overview: Barry, a pathetic middle class man on the wrong side of 50 has locked himself in his bathroom, hiding a secret from his overbearing elderly mother. Somewhere, somehow, Barry has picked up an evil, sentient tapeworm which is driven him to madness.  After getting him to nearly kill someone, Barry knows there's only one thing left to do. Flush out the WUURM and grapple in a fight to the death!
tagline: Barry just thinks it's something he ate!
title: WUURM
